video.title: Once Upon a Time
video.synopsis: In this fantasy series, a young woman is drawn to a small Maine town and discovers that it's filled with elements of the fairy tale world.

episodes.synopsis: When Emma Swan is visited by the 10-year-old boy she gave up for adoption long ago, she returns him to his foster mother in a town called Storybrooke.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Regina tries to push Emma out of Storybrooke -- and Henry's life. Meanwhile, information about the evil queen's curse comes to light.
episodes.title: The Thing You Love Most

episodes.synopsis: Emma persuades Mary Margaret to read to a comatose hospital patient. In fairy-tale world, Prince Charming and Snow White meet for the first time.
episodes.title: Snow Falls

episodes.synopsis: Emma tries to help a pregnant woman get away from Mr. Gold. In fairy-tale world, Cinderella makes a deal with Rumplestiltskin.
episodes.title: The Price of Gold

episodes.synopsis: Sheriff Graham makes Emma a deputy. Back in fairy-tale world, Jiminy Cricket wants to leave the family business.
episodes.title: That Still Small Voice

episodes.synopsis: David must choose between Kathryn and Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Elsewhere, Prince Charming's destiny is altered.
episodes.title: The Shepherd

episodes.synopsis: As one of Storybrooke's residents starts to recall fairy-tale life, the town mourns a death, and the queen looks for an assassin to kill Snow White.
episodes.title: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter

episodes.synopsis: When Emma runs for sheriff, Regina and Mr. Gold engage in dirty politics. Meanwhile, Rumpelstiltskin looks for the power to help his son avoid war.
episodes.title: Desperate Souls

episodes.synopsis: Emma tries to save two kids from foster care by finding their birth father. Elsewhere, the queen has Hansel and Gretel steal an artifact from a rival.
episodes.title: True North

episodes.synopsis: While David and Mary Margaret continue to struggle with their feelings, a mysterious new arrival in Storybrooke makes Regina and Emma suspicious.
episodes.title: 7:15 A.M.

episodes.synopsis: As Sidney asks Emma for help uncovering evidence that could expose Regina's corruption, David and Mary Margaret continue to meet secretly.
episodes.title: Fruit of the Poisonous Tree

episodes.synopsis: When Mr. Gold's house is robbed, Emma suspects he's planning to seek vigilante justice. Meanwhile, Belle makes a deal.
episodes.title: Skin Deep

episodes.synopsis: David decides to tell Kathryn about his relationship with Mary Margaret. Meanwhile, Prince Charming agrees to help Abigail with a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: What Happened to Frederick

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret and Leroy team up to help nuns sell candles at the Miner's Day festival. Meanwhile, Emma investigates the disappearance of David's wife.
episodes.title: Dreamy

episodes.synopsis: Emma gives Ruby a job as her assistant. Meanwhile, David faces questions about Kathryn's disappearance.
episodes.title: Red-Handed

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret hires Mr. Gold as her attorney after Emma is forced to arrest her for the murder of David's wife.
episodes.title: Heart of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: During her search for Mary Margaret, Emma is kidnapped by a madman with an affinity for hats. Meanwhile, the evil queen hires a man of magic.
episodes.title: Hat Trick

episodes.synopsis: While Emma keeps searching for proof that Mary Margaret didn't murder Kathryn, the root of the evil queen's disdain for Snow White is revealed.
episodes.title: The Stable Boy

episodes.synopsis: As Mr. Gold attempts to expose August's true identity, Regina is confronted about her involvement in Kathryn's disappearance.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: While August takes Emma on a journey that will show her how to beat Regina and perhaps gain custody of Henry, Regina tries to seduce David.
episodes.title: The Stranger

episodes.synopsis: As Henry begs Emma to stay in Storybrooke, Regina works on a plot that could rid her of Emma permanently.
episodes.title: An Apple Red as Blood

episodes.synopsis: Emma and Regina work together to save Henry's life. In fairy-tale world, Prince Charming tries to escape from the queen and reunite with Snow White.
episodes.title: A Land Without Magic

episodes.synopsis: As fairy-tale characters awaken from the curse, they are not transported home; Prince Phillip and his companion realize they are to face a deadly foe.
episodes.title: Broken

episodes.synopsis: Regina continues to seek a way to regain her powers, and the seven dwarves discover what happens when one of the townspeople tries to leave the city.
episodes.title: We Are Both

episodes.synopsis: Emma and Mary Margaret try to find a portal to bring them back to Storybrooke, and Henry tries to talk Jefferson into reuniting with his daughter.
episodes.title: Lady of the Lake

episodes.synopsis: Belle threatens to leave Mr. Gold if he doesn't change; the dwarves try to find fairy dust; and Rumplestiltskin tries to save his wife from pirates.
episodes.title: The Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: As Regina tries to refrain from using her magic, she starts seeing a ghost from her past; Mary Margaret and Emma find a survivor of an Ogre massacre.
episodes.title: The Doctor

episodes.synopsis: Emma follows Capt. Hook up a beanstalk in the hopes of finding a magical compass; a fellow thief wants to make an honest woman out of Emma.
episodes.title: Tallahassee

episodes.synopsis: Ruby's fear about turning into a wolf is confirmed when she becomes the suspect for a vicious murder; Leroy finds treasure in a Storybrooke mine.
episodes.title: Child of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Cora tries to steal the compass from Emma and Mary Margaret; Regina and Mr. Gold put David's life in danger, hoping that he can contact Mary Margaret.
episodes.title: Into the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Hook and Cora face off with Emma and Mary Margaret in a race for the compass; Mr. Gold and Regina plan to kill anyone who enters the portal.
episodes.title: Queen of Hearts

episodes.synopsis: When Regina is accused of killing a fairy-tale character, Emma thinks she is innocent; Prince Charming and Snow White plan the evil queen's execution.
episodes.title: The Cricket Game

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Gold uses an unwilling test subject to see if his spell works; Belle runs into Capt. Hook; David and Mary Margaret look for a bigger house.
episodes.title: The Outsider

episodes.synopsis: A stranger may pose a threat to the true identity of the townspeople; Cora tries to reunite with Regina.
episodes.title: In the Name of the Brother

episodes.synopsis: Cora brings the giant to Storybrooke; Emma and Henry join Mr. Gold to search for his son; Greg asks Belle what she saw on the night of his accident.
episodes.title: Tiny

episodes.synopsis: Emma, Henry and Mr. Gold take their search to New York; Hook, Cora and Regina look for one of Rumplestiltskin's most precious possessions.
episodes.title: Manhattan

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret learns of Cora and Regina's plan for the dagger; the Blue Fairy offers Snow White an enchantment to save her mother.
episodes.title: The Queen Is Dead

episodes.synopsis: Cora and Regina try to overpower Mr. Gold; dark magic tempts Mary Margaret; and Rumplestiltskin offers his services to Cora.
episodes.title: The Miller's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: David, Emma and Mr. Gold try to protect Mary Margaret from a vengeful Regina; a man and his son find their way into Storybrooke.
episodes.title: Welcome to Storybrooke

episodes.synopsis: While on her own to deal with what happened with Cora, Mary Margaret comes across an entirely wooden August; Neal invites his fiancée to Storybrooke.
episodes.title: Selfless, Brave and True

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Gold asks David for help in jogging Belle's memory; Anton's magic beans begin to grow; Rumpelstiltskin goes after a thief.
episodes.title: Lacey

episodes.synopsis: Hook helps Regina with a plan to transport her and Henry to Fairytale Land; Emma grows suspicious of Tamara; the queen asks Rumpelstiltskin for help.
episodes.title: The Evil Queen

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret, David and Emma embark on a search when Regina and some magic beans go missing; Bae winds up in 19th century London.
episodes.title: Second Star to the Right

episodes.synopsis: Storybrooke's inhabitants brace themselves as Greg and Tamara activate the curse; Hook rescues Bae, who is being pursued by the Lost Boys.
episodes.title: And Straight on 'Til Morning

episodes.synopsis: Emma and her allies begin the dangerous journey to Neverland, where Henry is befriended by a mysterious boy. Neal recovers in the Enchanted Forest.
episodes.title: The Heart of the Truest Believer

episodes.synopsis: Emma meets Peter Pan, who gives her a map to Henry, but it works only if she accepts who she really is. Gold takes drastic action to protect himself.
episodes.title: Lost Girl

episodes.synopsis: Robin Hood helps Neal travel to Neverland. Hook suggests enlisting Tinker Bell to help battle Pan, but the angry fairy has a bitter past with Regina.
episodes.title: Quite a Common Fairy

episodes.synopsis: Gold and Neal are reunited and remember their first meeting with Pan. Emma finds the secret map that Neal used to escape from Neverland in the past.
episodes.title: Nasty Habits

episodes.synopsis: Hook attempts to save David from the deadly Dream Shade poison and remembers when he first came to Neverland. Emma tries to get a message to Henry.
episodes.title: Good Form

episodes.synopsis: Snow White helps Ariel get to know Prince Eric. In Neverland, Emma reveals her true feelings about Neal while Regina and Gold form an uneasy alliance.
episodes.title: Ariel

episodes.synopsis: Ariel succeeds in retrieving Pandora's box from Storybrooke while Emma captures Pan's shadow. Pan forces a mysterious prisoner to trick Henry.
episodes.title: Dark Hollow

episodes.synopsis: Neal finally believes that Rumplestiltskin has changed and wants to save Henry, while Pan's true identity and nefarious plans for Henry are revealed.
episodes.title: Think Lovely Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: In Storybrooke's past, Regina struggles with her efforts to adopt a baby. In Neverland, the heroes believe they have succeeded in rescuing Henry.
episodes.title: Save Henry

episodes.synopsis: Pan wants to turn Storybrooke into a new Neverland. Snow and Charming hunt a monster and learn that they must be responsible for their own happiness.
episodes.title: The New Neverland

episodes.synopsis: In order to prevent Pan's curse, which will steal the memories of everyone in Storybrooke, both Gold and Regina must make tremendous sacrifices.
episodes.title: Going Home

episodes.synopsis: Hook helps Emma regain her memory, but when she goes to Storybrooke, she learns that no one can remember the year they spent in the Enchanted Forest.
episodes.title: New York City Serenade

episodes.synopsis: Robin Hood helps Regina sneak into her castle and they learn that the intruder is the Wicked Witch of the West. In Storybrooke, Emma and Regina unite.
episodes.title: Witch Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Zelena plots to steal something precious from David, while in Fairy Tale Land, Charming meets Rapunzel and helps her overcome her deepest fears.
episodes.title: The Tower

episodes.synopsis: Neal returns to Storybrooke, where he impresses Emma with his courage. In the Enchanted Forest, Neal, Belle and Lumiere search for Rumplestiltskin.
episodes.title: Quiet Minds

episodes.synopsis: Zelena challenges Regina to a battle and tries to collect another item for her mysterious spell. The reason for Zelena's lifelong envy is revealed.
episodes.title: It's Not Easy Being Green

episodes.synopsis: In both the past and the present, Hook tries to help Ariel find Prince Eric, with disastrous results. Regina teaches Emma how to use magic.
episodes.title: The Jolly Roger

episodes.synopsis: After Regina loses her heart, she opens a portal to contact Cora and learn why she abandoned Zelena as a baby. Belle deduces Zelena's ultimate goal.
episodes.title: Bleeding Through

episodes.synopsis: Henry regains his memory but is threatened by Zelena. Snow and Charming learn from Glinda that only Emma's light magic can defeat the Wicked Witch.
episodes.title: A Curious Thing

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret goes into labor, but Emma may not be able to use magic to protect the baby. In Oz, Zelena's happiness is threatened by a new arrival.
episodes.title: Kansas

episodes.synopsis: When Zelena's time portal pulls Emma and Hook into the Enchanted Forest of the past, their actions have grave consequences for the future.
episodes.title: Snow Drifts

episodes.synopsis: Emma and Hook attempt to fix their mistakes and return to Storybrooke, while Charming and Snow prove that true love can't be unwritten.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home

episodes.synopsis: Elsa finds herself in Storybrooke and creates a snow monster for protection. Regina wonders if her "happily ever after" has been completely quashed.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Sisters

episodes.synopsis: While trying to find Anna, Elsa is startled by Emma and traps them both in an ice cave, with the freezing temperature placing Emma's life in peril.
episodes.title: White Out

episodes.synopsis: When an icy spell is cast on Marian, the Storybrooke residents place the blame on Elsa. But unbeknownst to them, someone is trying to frame her.
episodes.title: Rocky Road

episodes.synopsis: After Emma asks Hook out on a date, he visits Mr. Gold for his hand to be reattached so that he can embrace her with both hands.
episodes.title: The Apprentice

episodes.synopsis: Regina reluctantly teams up with Emma to search for the Snow Queen after Sidney discovers her whereabouts and agrees to lead her to the location.
episodes.title: Breaking Glass

episodes.synopsis: The race is on to track down the elusive Snow Queen in order to discover what her ultimate endgame is for Elsa and the residents of Storybrooke.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: The Snow Queen uses her prior knowledge of Emma to try to persuade her into thinking that they're more alike than Emma could possibly imagine.
episodes.title: The Snow Queen

episodes.synopsis: In Arendelle, the Snow Queen tries to pit Elsa and Anna against each other, but it proves more difficult than she anticipated.
episodes.title: Smash the Mirror: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Robin Hood has a clue that could point Regina to the author of the fairy-tale book, and Regina teams up with David and Mary to find Emma.
episodes.title: Smash the Mirror: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Mary Margaret and David rally Storybrooke's residents to prepare for the Spell of Shattered Sight while Belle and the fairies work on an antidote.
episodes.title: Fall

episodes.synopsis: Storybrooke is in a state of chaos with all the residents who are under the Snow Queen's Spell of Shattered Sight at one another's throats.
episodes.title: Shattered Sight

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the Snow Queen's spell, our heroes try to pick up the pieces, and Regina has to make a difficult choice.
episodes.title: Heroes and Villains

episodes.synopsis: With Gold banished, the Storybrooke residents attempt to resume their normal lives. But Emma and Regina must confront the true nature of evil.
episodes.title: Darkness On The Edge Of Town

episodes.synopsis: David and Mary Margaret suspect Cruella and Ursula have come to town under false pretenses, and Emma feels her friends are hiding something from her.
episodes.title: Unforgiven

episodes.synopsis: In order to infiltrate the Queens of Darkness as a spy for the heroes, Regina must prove she's still willing to get her hands dirty.
episodes.title: Enter the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Hook tries to learn what Ursula knows about Gold's endgame; Emma, Mary Margaret and David race to rescue August from Gold and the Queens of Darkness.
episodes.title: Poor Unfortunate Soul

episodes.synopsis: Hook tells Emma that her fate is at stake in Gold's plan, while Regina leads the villains on a wild goose chase.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: Emma is still reeling after learning the truth of her parents' history with Maleficent, but she must focus on finding the Author before Gold does.
episodes.title: Heart of Gold

episodes.synopsis: A young Cruella's oppressive mother uses her Dalmatians to terrorize her daughter. Regina keeps Gold from interfering with her plan to rescue Robin.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the De Vil

episodes.synopsis: As Emma’s inner darkness looms, she realizes Lily is her closest friend from foster care and sets out to find her and reunite her with her mother.
episodes.title: Lily

episodes.synopsis: Emma returns to Storybrooke to reunite Lily with Maleficent while Regina and Robin struggle to cope with the implications of Zelena's pregnancy.
episodes.title: Mother

episodes.synopsis: The Author proves to be a formidable wild card, and as Emma, her parents, Hook and Regina try to thwart him, he forges an alliance with Gold.
episodes.title: Operation Mongoose: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Emma, her parents, Hook and Regina scramble to stop them, the Author and Gold raise the stakes by turning the tables on heroes and villains alike.
episodes.title: Operation Mongoose: Part 2
